auth.terms: By creating an account, you agree to our

onboarding.description: Your AI-powered conference assistant is ready to help you navigate events, documents, and connect with fellow attendees.
onboarding.linkedinHelp: Help us personalize your conference experience and connect you with relevant people and content.
onboarding.privacyNote: Your information is kept private and used only to enhance your conference experience.

sidebar.deleteConversationDescription: This conversation and all its messages will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
sidebar.confirmDelete: Make sure you really want to delete this conversation before proceeding.

chat.startConversation: Start a new conversation by typing a message below.
chat.errorSending: Failed to send message. Please try again.
chat.discoverDescription: Your AI conference assistant for hackathon sessions, workshops, networking, and more

places.locationRequired: Location access required to show nearby places

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again

prompts.eventStages: Which stages are featured at VivaTech?
prompts.keynoteSpeakers: Who are some keynote speakers at VivaTech 2025?
prompts.mainThemes: What are the main themes of VivaTech 2025?
prompts.startupEvents: Is there a dedicated event for startups?
prompts.womenInTech: Is there a session focused on women in tech?
prompts.june12Events: What events are scheduled for June 12, 2025?
prompts.aiHealthcare: Are there sessions about AI and healthcare?
prompts.investorNetworking: Are there networking opportunities for investors?
prompts.quantumComputing: What sessions are related to quantum computing?
prompts.liveEntertainment: Is there live entertainment during VivaTech?
prompts.awards: Are there awards presented during VivaTech?
prompts.futureOfWork: Does VivaTech include sessions on the future of work?
prompts.aiIndustry: Where can I find sessions on AI in industry?
prompts.climateGreenTech: Is there a focus on climate and green tech?
prompts.robotics: Can attendees learn about the latest in robotics?
